description.en: The monthly Labour Force Report presents the statistics of labour force, employment and unemployment obtained from the Labour Force Survey (LFS).
description.bm: Laporan Tenaga Buruh bulanan membentangkan statistik berkaitan tenaga buruh, guna tenaga dan pengangguran yang diperoleh daripada Survei Tenaga Buruh (STB).

variables.name: date
variables.desc_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with DD set to 01 since the data is at monthly frequency
variables.desc_bm: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan DD ditetapkan sebagai 01 kerana data berfrekuensi bulanan

en.methodology: The Labour Force Survey (LFS) provides statistics on the labour force, employment and unemployment at national and state level, as well as across urban and rural areas. Data from this survey is published on a monthly, quarterly and annual basis. A comprehensive and systematic approach in data collection and processing has been maintained over a period of time in order to obtain comparable time series statistics.
en.caveat: The sum of each category may not always equal to the totals shown in related tables because of independent rounding to one decimal place. However, the differences are not obvious.
en.publication: [Labour Force Report, June 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-06_labour_en.pdf), the latest edition of the monthly labour force statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on the labour force](https://open.dosm.gov.my/labour-market).

bm.methodology: Survei Tenaga Buruh (STB) menyediakan statistik tenaga buruh, guna tenaga dan pengangguran di peringkat nasional dan negeri serta di kawasan bandar dan luar bandar. Data daripada survei ini diterbitkan secara bulanan, suku tahunan dan tahunan. Pendekatan yang lengkap dan sistematik dalam pengumpulan dan prosesan data dikekalkan dari semasa ke semasa untuk mendapatkan perbandingan statistik siri masa.
bm.caveat: Hasil tambah bagi sesuatu kategori mungkin tidak sentiasa sama dengan jumlah yang ditunjukkan dalam jadual yang berkaitan kerana pembundaran secara bebas kepada satu titik perpuluhan. Walau bagaimanapun, perbezaan ini tidak ketara.
bm.publication: [Laporan Tenaga Buruh, Jun 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-06_labour_bm.pdf), edisi terkini bagi statistik tenaga buruh bulanan yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM sendiri juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang tenaga buruh](https://open.dosm.gov.my/labour-market).

variables.name: u_rate
variables.desc_en: [Float] Ratio of unemployed to labour force size
variables.desc_bm: [Apung] Nisbah jumlah penganggur ke bilangan tenaga buruh

en.methodology: The Labour Force Survey (LFS) provides statistics on the labour force, employment and unemployment at national and state level, as well as across urban and rural areas. Data from this survey is published on a monthly, quarterly and annual basis. A comprehensive and systematic approach in data collection and processing has been maintained over a period of time in order to obtain comparable time series statistics.
en.caveat: The sum of each category may not always equal to the totals shown in related tables because of independent rounding to one decimal place. However, the differences are not obvious.
en.publication: [Labour Force Report, June 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-06_labour_en.pdf), the latest edition of the monthly labour force statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on the labour force](https://open.dosm.gov.my/labour-market).

bm.methodology: Survei Tenaga Buruh (STB) menyediakan statistik tenaga buruh, guna tenaga dan pengangguran di peringkat nasional dan negeri serta di kawasan bandar dan luar bandar. Data daripada survei ini diterbitkan secara bulanan, suku tahunan dan tahunan. Pendekatan yang lengkap dan sistematik dalam pengumpulan dan prosesan data dikekalkan dari semasa ke semasa untuk mendapatkan perbandingan statistik siri masa.
bm.caveat: Hasil tambah bagi sesuatu kategori mungkin tidak sentiasa sama dengan jumlah yang ditunjukkan dalam jadual yang berkaitan kerana pembundaran secara bebas kepada satu titik perpuluhan. Walau bagaimanapun, perbezaan ini tidak ketara.
bm.publication: [Laporan Tenaga Buruh, Jun 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-06_labour_bm.pdf), edisi terkini bagi statistik tenaga buruh bulanan yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM sendiri juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang tenaga buruh](https://open.dosm.gov.my/labour-market).

en.methodology: The Labour Force Survey (LFS) provides statistics on the labour force, employment and unemployment at national and state level, as well as across urban and rural areas. en.caveat: The sum of each category may not always equal to the totals shown in related tables because of independent rounding to one decimal place. However, the differences are not obvious.

variables.name: u_rate_15_30
variables.desc_en: [Float] Ratio of unemployed to labour force size, both of age 15-30
variables.desc_bm: [Apung] Nisbah jumlah penganggur ke bilangan tenaga buruh, dalam kumpulan umur 15-30
